ygData.subject: RE: Brad comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope didn t know that.  My enchanter isn t that high yet, only 17th.  Just remember the huge posting stating that charm would no longer work on Mobs above
ygData.messageBody:
Nope didn't know that. My enchanter isn't that high yet, only 17th. Just
remember the huge posting stating that charm would no longer work on Mobs
above 35th.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 1:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Brad comments


From: jhenders@...

On Tue, Dec 07/99, "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:

> Also how about the nerf to charm that makes it work only on lvl 35 and
> below. We get to use the spell for 8 levels or so, then on blues for a
bit
> more. Everyone else that gets a charm get to use it for 23+ levels. So
> this nerf hits us harder than other charming classes.
>

You do realize that enchanters don't have a level limit on charm at all
I hope. I saw an enchanter the other day using a pet Bok knight to help
break the froglok king room and Boks are definately over 38.
